front.title: American National Standard Procedures for Periodic Inspection of Cobalt-60 and Cesium-137 Teletherapy Equipment
front.abstract: Procedures for the inspection of cobalt-60 and cesium-137 teletherapy equipment are suggested. Their purpose is to enable users to identify and quantify malfunctions or maladjustments of the safety and radiation-defining components. Methods and equipment are listed for each procedure.
